Quotations.ab:
Revāyat of Kāmdin Šapur (var. a) (MU1, p. I. 580), cf. Revāyat of Kāmdin Šapur (var. b.) (MU1, p. I. 584), on the Nērang ī Āb ud Padyāb ceremony:
(Pāz.) u. zōt̰. gāh. ābarətārą̇n. ṣ̌udan. u. rāspī. vāj. guftan. pa. gāhi. asnauuārą̇n. ṣ̌ūdan. u. drust. naṣ̌istan. u. vāj. gə̄riftan. īāni. xṣ̌naoϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ aṣ̌əm vōhū ẏak. u. dast. ātaš. dāštan. u. xušak. kardan. u. darə. nīrəṇg. bar. gə̄rə̄ftan. u. zōt̰. aṣ̌əm vōhū guftan. u. nīrəṇg. nigarδan. vōhū āv. nigarīδan. vaištəm tā. sar. guftan. āt̰.ẏašt. šastan. si aṣ̌əm vōhū barīn. dastūr. x́ą̇nadan. u. nigarīdan. ādušt. šustan.
"The zōt should go to the place of the ābarətār and the rāspīg should utter the wāz and go to the place of the asnuuār and seat erected. And (the zōt) should take the wāz saying xṣ̌naoϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ aṣ̌əm vōhū once and he should the hands (over) the fire and make them dry. And he should up the top (of the vessel) of the nērang and the zōt should say the aṣ̌əm vōhū and look at the nērang at vōhū and look at the water at vaištəm and say until the end (while) cleaning the ādušt. He should read three aṣ̌əm vōhū this way and looking and cleaning the ādušt."

ab.ab: Revāyat of Behdin Ǧāsā (MU1, p. I. 592), on the Nērang ī Āb ud Padyāb ceremony:

pas az cap-e dast-e ādušt šodan va dast durtar kardan āheste dast bordan miyān-e ādušt tar kardan cenānke nami qaṭre-ye āb bar mašrabe-ye gomiz narizand miyān-e ādušt šostan pas ānkas ke barsam baste ast vāǧ begoftan dast az barsam ǧodā kardan ḫod rā az arvis ǧodā kardan ḫod rā az arvis bāyad ke ǧodā šode bāšad

"Then he should go to the left side of the ādušt, should hold his hand aloof, carry it over slowly, and throw water on the surface of ādušt, in such a way that not a single drop of water may fall over the vessel of urine. He should then wash the surface of the ādušt. Then the person who has tied the barsom should finish off the wāz, separate his hands from the barsom, and come out of the urvis."
